text: Meyi Mensεm no afri wͻn a wͻ’yε akεsesεm wͻ asaase so a wͻ’nni ho kwan sε wͻ’yε no so; sε wͻ’hunu nsεnkyerεnee biara a wͻ’nnye nni, nasε wͻ’hunu ͻkwan tenenee a w’ͻnnfa no (sε) ͻkwan (pa); na sε wͻ’hunu ͻyera kwan a wͻ’fa no ͻkwan (pa). Saa, efrisε wͻ’fa Yεn Nsεm no nkontomposεm na wͻ’bu wͻn ani gu so
